8:46 am, the attack on the World Trade Center begins.
102 minutes later, the Twin Towers fall,...
...taking with them the lives of nearly 3,000...
Ten years later, we honor the fallen...
...including over 6,000 service members killed in wars after the attacks.
The 9/11 heroes run in 5K for the 9K who have lost their lives since 9/11.
